integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Mistral using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Mistral and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Mistral API key from the Mistral website [here](https://auth.mistral.ai/ui/login).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for codestral-2405 FIM Completion call on Mistral using virtual key

portkeyNodeSDK.codeExample: sample node.js SDK code for codestral-2405 FIM Completion call on Mistral using virtual key
